column4: 'lo everyone. I have a toshiba satellite M70 that won't use 1280x800 resolution. i've tried using the wiki guide, but it's still not supporting the right resolution. any suggestions?
you too, huh? I've hit a wall with the screen res; it's the only thing between almost working and working ubuntu install
on suse also it doesn't make the accurate res its always lower than the one on xp
